Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Greenhead Park, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2, 5th £1. 6 bands competed.
June 13, 2018, 9:28 p.m. June 13, 2018, 9:36 p.m.
1 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band William Heap Oberon [unknown arranger]
2 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Fenton Renshaw Oberon [unknown arranger]
3 Armley and Wortley Prize Band William Holdsworth Oberon [unknown arranger]
4 Daisy Hill Subscription Tom Dean Songs of England [Round]
5 Hinchliffe Mill Band Angus Holden Oberon [unknown arranger]
6 Skelmanthorpe Band Angus Holden Songs of England [Round]
